original_title: セクハラ課長に社内で調教され続けて牝堕ちしてしまった変態地味OL
overview: I'm a plain office worker who doesn't stand out even in the company. That's me, but... I have a propensity that I can't tell anyone. For some reason, I get excited when I see Manager Shimada, who is hated by 80% of the female employees in the company, no, 90%. His face is rough and disgusting, his breath stinks, and the way he talks is physiologically unacceptable. However, he has a delusion that he is violated by Mr. Shimada and masturbates. She didn't want anyone to know about this.
title: A Perverted Sober OL Who Has Been Trained In-house By The Chief Of Sexual Harassment And Has Fallen Female
